class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|upload~_pic~_link ~?a ~?content ~?crop ~?input ~?submit action~_after~_submit
    service>>


    ~Creates a link with a label and a submit button to upload a picture~.


    ~The client function <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|action~_after~_submit>> will be called first~,
    for example to close the menu containing the link~.


    ~You can add attributes to the ~H~T~M~L tag with the optional parameter <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?a>>~.
    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?input>> and <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?submit>> are couples <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~(attributes~, content~_children~)>> for the
    label and the submit button where <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|attributes>> is a list of attributes for
    the tag and <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|content~_children>> is a list of children~. ~By default~, they are
    empty~.


    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?content>> is the link text~. ~The default value is "~Change profile picture"~.


    <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|service>> is the service called to upload the picture~.


    ~You can crop the picture by giving a value to <<span class="odocwiki_inlinecode"|~?crop>>~.
>>
